summary:
##  UI, Rendering & Cache Optimizations

###  Splash & Rendering
- Removed low-spec splash path -> unified splash now runs everywhere
- Lightened shadows/glows and added visual caching for smoother rendering
- Kept animations intact while reducing GPU cost

###  Scrolling Smoothness
- Implemented per-frame **easing scroll pipeline**:
  - Scroll input accumulates into a target offset
  - Eases on `CompositionTarget.Rendering`
  - Coalesces rapid wheel/touchpad events
  - Prevents stacked animation lag and stays in sync with scrollbars

---

##  PathPilot UX Refresh

- Rebuilt PathPilot with a **lighter, cleaner layout**:
  - Concise header + details toggle
  - Minimal, adaptive cards modeled after Known Processes
  - Bigger cards, equal-width action buttons, responsive tile layout
- Simplified overlays (inventory, switching, dialogs) to focused text + progress
- Cards now show summary, version chip, active path, and quick actions
- Only current version shown; per-runtime details available on demand
- “Make active” now correctly shows **machine-scope warning** and proceeds cleanly
- Switch & Details dialogs restyled to match Essentials-style modals

---

##  Smart Cache & Tray Behavior

- Added lightweight **tray sweep** when minimized + run-in-background:
  - Sweeps expired pages only
  - Skips while automation is active
  - Stops automatically on restore/exit
- Replaced fixed polling with **event-driven cache scheduling**:
  - Sweeps run only when something is expiring
  - Timer reschedules to exact next expiry (30s–10m clamp)
  - Zero background work when nothing is due
- Existing idle working-set trim remains unchanged

---

##  Essentials Page Refresh

- Refreshed Essentials with a **bolder palette** and virtualized tile grid
- Rebuilt task shelf using BubbleScrollListView + adaptive virtualization
- Cards now use **chips instead of long text** (category, duration, automation, risk)
- Added automation-ready and high-risk flags to task models

---

##  Bootstrap UX Improvement

- Moved PowerShell 7+ install guidance into a **highlighted callout under the title**
- Callout shows only on first run and auto-hides once managers are detected
- Removed old right-column PowerShell card for a cleaner layout
